format_data:
{%- set doc = doc -%}

Work Order Estimation

Estimation No:
{{ doc.name }}
Date:
{{ frappe.format_date(doc.creation) }}
Status:
{{ doc.status }}

Job Details

Client: {{ doc.client_name }}
Project: {{ doc.project_name }}
Delivery Date: {{ frappe.format_date(doc.delivery_date) }}
Urgency: {{ doc.urgency_level }}

Paper Specifications

Quantity: {{ doc.quantity }} pieces
GSM: {{ doc.gsm }} g/m²
Dimensions: {{ doc.length_cm }} × {{ doc.width_cm }} cm
Finish: {{ doc.finish }}
Paper Type: {{ doc.paper_type }}
Waste Allowance: {{ doc.waste_percentage }}%

Paper Calculations

Weight per Piece: {{ frappe.format_number(doc.weight_per_piece_kg, 6) }} kg
Pieces per KG: {{ frappe.format_number(doc.pieces_per_kg, 2) }}
Net Weight: {{ frappe.format_number(doc.net_weight_kg, 3) }} kg
Waste Weight: {{ frappe.format_number(doc.waste_kg, 3) }} kg
Total Weight: {{ frappe.format_number(doc.total_weight_kg, 3) }} kg
Rate per KG: {{ frappe.format_currency(doc.rate_per_kg) }}
{% if doc.estimation_processes %}

Production Processes

{% for process in doc.estimation_processes %} {% endfor %}
Process Details Rate Qty Total Cost
{{ process.process_type }} {{ process.details or '' }} {{ frappe.format_currency(process.rate) }} {{ process.qty }} {{ frappe.format_currency(process.total_cost) }}
{% endif %}

Cost Analysis

Paper Cost: {{ frappe.format_currency(doc.total_paper_cost) }}
Process Cost: {{ frappe.format_currency(doc.total_cost - doc.total_paper_cost) }}
Total Cost: {{ frappe.format_currency(doc.total_cost) }}
Cost per Unit: {{ frappe.format_currency(doc.cost_per_unit) }}
Profit Margin: {{ doc.profit_margin }}%
Margin Amount: {{ frappe.format_currency(doc.margin_amount) }}
{% if doc.sales_price %}
Sales Price: {{ frappe.format_currency(doc.sales_price) }}
Total Revenue: {{ frappe.format_currency(doc.sales_price * doc.quantity) }}
{% endif %}
{% if doc.notes %}

Notes & Specifications

{{ doc.notes }}
{% endif %}

Prepared by: {{ doc.owner }}

Date: {{ frappe.format_date(doc.modified) }}

Company: Ebkar – Technology & Management Solutions
name: Work Order Estimation
